story.name: 01 Creation of spirit world
story.TasksAllowedPf: VernacularLangFields, NationalBtLangFields, InternationalBtFields, Anchors, Retellings, TestQuestions, Answers, Retellings2, Answers2

CraftingInfo.StoryPurpose: God is the maker of seen and unseen things.
CraftingInfo.ResourcesUsed: hindi bible (bible society of indian),tw,english vbible ,audio, recorded story in hindi.

TestsRetellings.TestRetelling: Test done on: 2011-Aug-02. UNS heard the story 3 times.

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: ready for recording.
IvR: the anchors for this story were hard, right! I have made some suggestions, mostly taken from the Hindi story set, which 'creation' story I can see you used as a model for this. (which is fine!).
IvR: the retelling looks good; near the end he made it a little shorter, but nothing significant seems lost. You can proceed to make testing questions!
ok

You can proceed to testing now. We need one more retelling, and two sets of answers. I've made them required to see how that goes. I don't need to see the story again before you have completed the testing.
ok
one retelling done (2nd not required as per new instruction), testing questions answers are still pending.
yes i know but i was thinking i have done one already i finish doc. but second will take time . so it is with me so let me send this whatever i have . like that i thought .
fine.
IvR: Re: you can get a 2nd set of answers.
done
IvR: Re: PA on Aug 18 2011

IvR: Re: ok for recording - discuss however if the team wants this one as the first story. I could imagine that it may be friendlier to start iwh the creation story, but maybe to put this story at the end - as an appendix. I don't know if that would work though...

Verse.StoryLine: आज हमन जम्‍मो डहार जतका भी चीज देखथन।
आज जो सभी जगह जितना भी हम देखते है।
toady also we¦us look-HAB PRES¦is
What ever places we are seeing today

Retellings.Retelling: आज जम्‍मो डहान जे चीज ला हम देखथन
today whatever we see arround

Verse.StoryLine: ते सब ला परमात्‍मा हा बनाहे।
उन सब को परमात्‍मा व्‍यक्‍ति बनाहे।
this all created by parmatma .
That all God has made.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आपके विचार मे काला-काल हमन जम्‍मो डहार ज चीज देखथन ते सब ला परमात्‍मा हा बनाहे
iyo what are things that we see arround us this all created by parmatma

Answers.Answer: अब पक्रतिक मे सब को पेड पौधा ,धेरती अकास सबको परमात्‍मा ने बनाय है अब आदमी मे तो इतना शक्‍ति नही है कि अपने से कुछ बना सके । अब हमलोग जितना भी देखत है आस-पास सब परमात्‍मा का ही देन है हवा कि जो नही भी दिखता है उसको भी परमात्‍मा न बनाया है जैसे कि इस बताया गया हे सवरग दुत उसको भी परमात्‍मा ने बनाया है

in nature god made tree-plants, earht sky . human has not have this power that can make this by himself. whatever we see this all things is created by god air which can not see but parmatma made it like wise swargdut also made by parmatma .
दुनिया ,पेड पौघा ,मनुष्‍य पशु -पक्षी इस सबको परमात्‍मा के दवारा बनाय गये है परमात्‍मा के दुत भी परमात्‍मा के दवारा बनाय गये है
world ,tree-plants,human everything created by God. and dut of parmatma also created by God.

Retellings.Retelling: ओ सब ला परमात्‍मा हा बनाये हवय
that all created by parmtama

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re:tst 1: 'iyo what are things that we see arround us this all created by parmatma'. I can't quite figure out the meaning of this question, are you asking which things are made by paramatma, or whether things ARE made by paramatma? (I am assuming the first)
i want to know whethet they say about unseen things or not.
Since the story has 'seen', I don't think anyone will answre with anything that is 'unseen'. but you can try...
actually i wanted to notice that they will tell about dut or not .
well, they do come up with that also, so I guess you're fine!

Verse.StoryLine: ता सबसे पहीली परमात्‍मा हा धरती अउ ये सवरग ला बनाईस ।
तो सबसे पहले परमात्‍मा ने धरती और सवरग को बनाया।
so first of all parmatma made earth and this heaven
So first of all God made earth and heaven.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर परमातम्‍मा हा सबसे पहीली धरती अउ ये सवरग ला बनाईस?
why do you think first of all parmatma made earth and this heaven

Answers.Answer: सबसे पहले इसलिय बनाया कि धरती को जब ताक पहले नही बनाता तो जीव -जन्‍तु मनुषयो को परमात्‍म कहा रखता । और सवरग इसलिय बनाया कि जो जो अच्‍छा काम करेगा उसको तो परमात्‍मा सवरग मे लायेगा ही।अचछा काम क अफल तो देगा ही इसलिय धरती के साथ साथ सवरग भी बनाया। तो इस धरती और सवरग का पहले बनाना बहुत महात्‍वपुर्ण था इसलिय इसको पहले बनाया।

first mad ereat and swag because if earth may not made then where this all living things and non lving things live and swarg made because who ever will do good work parmatma will bring them in swarg that;s way first gos made earth and swarg.
क्‍योकि धरती मे मनुष्‍य रहेगे और सवरग मे दुत रह सके इसलिय परमात्‍मा धरती और सवरग को बनाते है
becasue in the earth human and in heaven dut can live that's way parmatma made this heaven and earth.

Retellings.Retelling: सबसे पहीली परमात्‍मा हा धरती अउ सवरग ला बनाईसे
first of all parmtma made earth and heaven

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: anc: Col 1:16. You probalby need also Gen 1:1 to anchor the 'first of all'.
ok i did it .

Verse.StoryLine: अउ सवरग दुत मन ला घलो बनाईस।
और सवरग दुत भी बनाय।
and also made swargdut
And he also made angels.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आपके विचार मे काबर सवरग दुत मन ला घलो बनाईस
iyo why did also made swargdut

Answers.Answer: हो सकता है सवरग दतो को परमात्‍मा ने मनुष्‍यो कि मदद के लिय बनाया होगा ।जैसे कि अगर मनुषय बुर काम कर रहा तो ये सवरग दुत उसको सही रास्‍ता दिखा सके । इस कहानी बताया गया है कि ये सवरग दुद परमात्‍मा का नमन भजन करते थे तो वे अच्‍छे थे तो ये सवरग दुत मनुष्‍यो कि भी परमात्‍मा का नमन भजन करना सिखायेगे।

may swarg dut made tohelp people like if any people do bad do swatg dut can guide them . in this story tells that swargdut worship parmtma so they were good so as they are doing good same can teach to man also.
सवरग के काम को करने के लिय परमात्‍मा दुतो को बनाता है अपने (परमात्मा)आदेस को मानने के लिय भी और परमात्मा का नमन भजन करे इसलिय बनाया परमात्‍मा ने उन्‍हे बनाया
to done work in heaven parmatma created dut. to obey god's commandments and worship him that's way.

Retellings.Retelling: अउ सवरग मे कुछ सवरग दुत भी बनाईसे
and made also some swargdut in the heaven

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: /अउ सवरग मे/ 'in the heaven'. I don't think we can anchor that angels were made 'in heaven'. Could you just leave it out, and say that they 'were made'?
ok iwill tell "और सवरग दुतो को भी बानया"

Verse.StoryLine: अउ ये सवरग दुत परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करय।
और ये सवरग दुत लोग परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करते है।
and this swargdut does worship to parmatma
And these angels are worshiping God

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर ये सवरग दुत परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करय?
why do you think this swargdut does worship to parmatma ?

Answers.Answer: अब सवरग दुतो को तो परमात्‍मा ने बनाय था ना तो जैसे कोई माँ अगर अपने बच्‍चे को पैदा करती है तो उसका बच्‍चा केवल अपनी मा का ही बात मानता है तो जेसे जैसे उसकी मा बोलेगी वह बच्‍चा वैसे वैसे ही करेगा। तो ठीक वैसे ही उस सवरग दुद की रचना परमात्‍मा न किया था । तो परमात्‍मा उनका मार्गदशन करते थे। इसलिय वह परमात्‍मा का नमन भजन करते थे।

swargdut were made by parmatma . like mother give birth to a child . so whatever mother tell her son child does . likewise swargdut made by parmatma . so parmatma was guiding them that;s way they were worshipping parmatma .
क्‍योकि परमात्‍मा तो ही सबको बनाया है धरती सवरग सबको उसी ने बनाय है तो परमात्‍मा के इस काम सबको देख कर उसका नमन भजन करते थे। तो परमत्‍मा ही उनके लिय सब कुछ थे।
because everything parmatma have created earth and heaven . so by seen work of parmatma they worship him that parmatma made this all.

Retellings.Retelling: अउ ओ सवरग दुत मन हा परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करथे
and that swargdut does worship to parmatma

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: anc: Ps 148:3. These anchors don't talk about 'angels', but you can take 148:2
ok i did it

Verse.StoryLine: अउ ओकर आज्ञा के पालन करय।
और उनकी आज्ञा का पालन करते है ।
obey his commandment
And are obeying his commandments.

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re:tst 1: 'why do you think obey his commandment?'. You could also ask, 'what kind of things do you think that God might be commanding them to do?'
ok i did it

Verse.StoryLine: अउ परमात्‍मा हा ओ सवरग दुत मन ला अलग अलग जिम्‍मेदारी देथे।
और परमात्‍मा ने उन सवरग दुतो को अलग अलग उनकी जिम्‍मेदारी देते है।
and parmatma gave them different responsibility
And to God gave these angels different-different responsibilities.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि परमात्‍मा हा ओ सवरग दुत मन ला काय अलग अलग जिम्‍मेदारी देथे?
what kind of responsibilities do you think that God might have given them?

Answers.Answer: कोई सवरग दुत को पाप और पुन्य का हिसाब करने का जिम्‍मेदारी दिया होगा । और किसी को यस दिया होगा कि कौन से प्राणी कौन से काम करेगा ।या किसी को लेखा जोखा करने को दिया होगा ।
maysome were given to account of sinfull work and good wotk, or may some kind of accoutibility of some work.
दुत लोगो को धरती मे जाने का जिमेदारी दिया होगा ।नियम का पालन करने और करवाने का जिम्‍मेदारी दिये रहते है । सवरग का देखभाल करने का जिम्‍मेदारी दिया होगा।
may dut had given responsibility to take car of earth.obey instruction og god and to make obey others. taking car of heaven.

Retellings.Retelling: तो परमात्‍मा हा सोचीसे कि मै ये मन ला कुछ काम देदेथव इकर मन बर
so parmtam thought that i give them some work for them

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: anc: Ps 103:21. I've added Jude 1:6 as an anchor. I see you have taken the Hindi story as an example. that's fine. I will send you by email the file with the documentation for the Hindi story set - sometimes this might come handy. I have taken this Jude anchor from that.
ok but. does jude talk about responsibility that angels were having
'proper domain' is interpreted as 'domains of work' - so indeed, different responsibilities.
ok

IvR: Re:tst 1: 'why do you think parmatma gave them different responsibility?'. Or maybe rephrase this as 'what kind of responsibilities do you think that God might have given them?' (if you think this question is too similar to the one I suggested in line 6, maybe leave that one out and ask only this.)
ok i will skip Quetion from line no 6.

Verse.StoryLine: कुछ मन ला धरती मे देथे अउ कुछ मनला सवरग मे देथे ।
कुछ लोगो को धरती मे देते है और कुछ लोगो को सवरग मे देते है।
some of them in the earth and some of them in the heaven
Some on earth and some in heaven.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर कुछ मन ला धरती मे देथे अउ कुछ मनला सवरग मे देथे?
why do you think some of them in the earth and some of them in the heaven?

Answers.Answer: जैसे कि सब लोग धरती मे ही काम करते तो सवरग मे कौन करता ।इसिलय परमात्‍मा ने सब को अलग अलग काम दिया और अगल अलग जगा मे दिया ।
like all swagdut work on earth then who will work in swarg. that;s way parmatma gave different type of activity and given in different place.
कई तरह के दुत रहे होगे तो सबको परमात्‍मा के आज्ञा पालन का जिम्‍मेदारी दिया होगा जो भी उसके मुखिया रहा होगा उसको।
many type of dut were there. who ever the main cheif he will given the work to make obey other god commandment.

Retellings.Retelling: तो आधा जन ला सवरग मे देदिस काम अउ आधा झन ला धरती मे
so half were given work in the earth and half in the heaven.

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: anc: Isa 42:5. The hindi story set uses as anchor for 'in heaven": Isaiah 6:2. And for 'on earth': 'gen 19:1
ok i did also

Verse.StoryLine: लेकिन शुरु से ही कुछ सवरग दुत मन हा परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करे बर छोड दिस।
लकेइन सुरु से ही कुछ सवरग दुत लोग परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करना छोड दिये।
but from the begnning some of swargdut left to worship parmatma .
But from the beginning some angels stopped worshiping God.

Retellings.Retelling: तो कुछ सवरग दुत मन हा परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करे बर छोड देथे
so some of swarg dut left to worship parmatma

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: anc: Jude 1:6. we need an achor for 'from the beginning.' the Hindi story uses 1 John 3:8
ok i ddi it

Verse.StoryLine: अउ ओकर से विसवास घात करीस ।
और परमात्‍मा से विसवास घार करते है।
and rebelled /unfaithful to him
And broke God's trust.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर शुरु से ही कुछ सवरग दुत मन हा परमात्‍मा के नमन भजन करे बर छोड दिस अउ ओकर से विसवास घात करीस?
why do you think from the begnning some of swargdut left to worship parmatma and rebelled /unfaithful to him?

Answers.Answer: उसमे कुछ सवरग दुत लोग एसे थे जिसको परमत्‍मा का नमन भजन करना या अच्‍छा काम करना पंसद नही आया होगा । तो इसलिय परमात्‍मा से विसवासघात किये मतलब पाप किये।
may there were some swardut who are not liking to worship of god . that's way beccame unfaithfull to god means did sin.

कुछ सवरग दुत इसलिय करते है कि वे लोग परमात्मा के आदेस का पालन नही करते होगे कि यह अब हामरा काम नही है वे लोग अपने आप को बडे समझते रहे होगे। इसलिय वे लोग दुसरे दुत के सात मिलकर विसवास घात करते है । जलन रहा होगा उन लोगो को परमात्‍मा के प्रति।

because some of did like this becasue theymight htought that do not need to fallow the commandments of god. thye thought that this is not our work. they thought themselves higher.that's way became unfaithful with others. jealosy with god

Retellings.Retelling: अउ ओकर साथ विसवास घात करथे
and rebelled /unfaithful with him

Verse.StoryLine: अउ ये मन हा परमात्‍मा के आज्ञा ला नई मानीस ।
और ये लोग परमात्‍मा जो आज्ञा दिये थे नही माने।
and they have not obeyed parmatma's commandment.
And they did not obey God's command's.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर ये मन हा परमात्‍मा के आज्ञा ला नई मानीस?
why do you think they have not obeyed parmatma's commandment?

Answers.Answer: जो लोग पापी स्‍वाभ का रहते है ओ लोग बहुत घंमड से भरे हुये होते है कि मै किसी कि आज्ञा को नही मानुगा । अपने से बडो कि भी इज्‍जत नही करते है ।तो वे सवरग दुत सोचते रहे होगे कि सबसे बडा हमही लोग है हमारे से बडा कोई नही है। हमलोग किसी की आज्ञा को नही मानेगे ।

who is sin full nature they are filled with proud. like i will not obey any once commandment. do not give respect elders. so swarg dut thought that we are superier there is no one higher then us . that's way will not obey any once commandment.
कुछ दुत लोगो को परमात्ममा का आज्ञा देना अच्‍छा नही लगा होगा । उनकी इच्‍छा के खिलाप रहा होगा।
may some of dut did not like the commandment of god. may be this was out of their willingness.

Retellings.Retelling: अउ परमात्‍मा के आज्ञा ला नई मानय
and did not obey parmatma's commandment

Verse.StoryLine: अउ इही बात हा परमात्‍मा के नजर मे पाप हरे ।
और इही बात हा परमात्‍मा के नजर मे पाप है।
and this thing is sin in eyes of parmatma .
And this is sin in God's eyes.

TestQuestion.TestQuestionLine: आप काय सोचथो कि काबर इही बात हा परमात्‍मा के नजर मे पाप हरे?
why do you think this thing is sin in eyes of parmatma ?

Answers.Answer: अब विसवास घात करना ,दुसरे को चोट पहहुचान तो पाप करना ही माना जाता है तो इसलिय परमात्‍मा पाप का सजा देना चाहता था।
now decieved some once , is considerd sin only na . that's way parmatma wants to punish them
इसलिय कि परमात्‍मा के खिलाप कुछ भी करने से परमात्‍मा को नराज होते है इसलिय परमात्‍मा के नजर मे पाप है उसकि बात को नहि मानना।

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: Re: /तब परमात्‍मा हा ये सोचके रखे हे।/ /तब परमात्‍मा ये सोचके रखा था ।/ 'then parmtama kept thinking'. I am not 100% sure about the full meaning of सोचके रखा था Does रखा था mean 'made a decision'? We dont' want to convey the meaning that God is only 'thinking about this' - we want to make sure that it is clear that God made a solid plan.

ExegeticalHelps.ExegeticalHelp: TN on 1Jn 3:8 (The Son of God came in order to destroy the devil's work / undo everything that Satan has done.)" TN comment: "destroy the devil's work": (Meaning) The devil's work is tempting people to sin and getting control over their lives so that they continue to sin.

ConsultantConversation.ConsultantNote: IvR: the HIndi story has Gen 1:28 as anchor but that one must be wrong. However TEV has a footnote everytime the word 'Satan' appears, saying " A supernatural being whose name indicates he was regarded as the opponent of human beings." I've added that as an exegetical note.
ok. but can you tell me in Tw where i can see this.

Yes. Good question! Actually I now noticed they give this footnote not every time 'Satan' appears, but occasionally. Here is how to find this:
With TEV open and selected, click on 'search' on the top bar. Then click 'advanced query'. In the white box that comes after "Query for:" type 'satan'. Click 'okay'. The TEV wil now jump to one occurence of 'satan.' We want to see more, so we click the F4 button (does your computer have this?? at the top?), otherwise 'search', 'next hit'. An other way to get to the next occurence of the word is to click on the larger double right pointing arrows on the left bottom of your screen. Clicking instead on the left pointing arrows will give the previous hit again. Keep going to get to the next hit till you wil see a symbol after the word 'satan', that looks like a cross with an extra piece near the bottom. That means that there is a footnote. I find one of these for instance on Job 1:6. When you click on the cross, you will see the footnote. A footnote can give support to a certain interpretation in a story, and can be helpful to paste in an exegetical note. Everytime you are reading a story in one of the Bibles and you find a footnote symbol, it is helpful to read these notes. They can be quite enlighting.
